entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 9:05 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

Temperature: -6.2°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
